entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning.
